member.name: M:MakeSharp.Windows.Helpers.Extensions.MsBuildClean(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Invokes MSBuild.exe with Clean target and normal verbosity

member.name: M:MakeSharp.Windows.Helpers.Extensions.MsBuildRelease(System.String)
member.summary: Invokes MSBuild.exe with Build target, Release configuration and no verbosity

member.name: M:MakeSharp.Windows.Helpers.Extensions.Robocopy(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Copies files from srcDist to destDir using robocopy.exe (it should be default on any Windows starting with Vista)
